Hi,

   We have been using heritrix for a while now and we like it so far w=
ith
all the pluggable modules and ease of extensibility. We see a big
diffe=
rence in the crawl rate. We ran two parallel crawls one with a seed
url and=
 no RegExp Decide filters and another with RegExp Decide rule
filters and w=
e see that the crawler with filters performs crawl rate at
6 to 9 URIs per =
second compared to the crawl without the decide filter
performs at 60 URIs/=
sec (on Avg). And we would like to scale to
performing the crawl at a highe=
r rate since our needs are more.

Our aim should be to get to >500 URIs/sec=
 which translates to 1.8
Million/Hr. What is the max crawl rate that can be=
 achived by heritrix
crawler.

Thanks, -Vinoth.
